title: 24H自助報到流程
content_en: Dear Guest, thank you for choosing Ximen Garden Inn! We provide a 24-hour self-check-in kiosk on the 3rd floor. Steps: 1. Enter Booking ID or Name 2. Scan ID/Passport 3. Fill E-mail 4. Payment (Cash/Credit Card) 5. Collect receipt and key card. If you need help, dial 13 on the phone next to the kiosk. Address: 3F, No. 90, Sec. 1, Zhonghua Rd, Wanhua District, Taipei City.
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，感謝您選擇喜園旅館！我們在 3 樓提供 24 小時自助報到機。步驟：1. 輸入訂單編號或姓名 2. 掃描證件/護照 3. 填寫 E-mail 4. 付款（現金/信用卡） 5. 領取發票與房卡。若遇問題，請撥打機器旁電話 13 聯繫客服。地址：台北市萬華區中華路一段90號3樓。
note: 📍 必發：包含地址與報到機步驟

title: 提早入住/晚退房
content_en: Dear Guest, regarding your request, our check-in time is 15:00 and check-out is 12:00. Early check-in or late check-out is subject to room availability on the day and costs NTD 300 per hour per room. Please provide your name and booking ID for us to make a note for you.
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，關於您的需求，本館標準入住時間為 15:00，退房為 12:00。提早入住或延後退房需視當日房況而定，費用為每小時 NTD 300。請提供您的姓名與訂單編號以便為您備註。
note: ⚠️ 提醒：需視房況且要收費

title: 行李寄放規定
content_en: We provide free luggage storage on the day of check-in/out. Please keep your valuables with you, as we are not responsible for lost items. Luggage kept for more than two days without notice may be disposed of.
content_tw: 本館提供入住/退房當日的行李寄放服務。貴重物品請隨身攜帶，本館不負保管責任。若行李存放超過兩天且未告知，可能會被處理。

title: 禁菸與備品說明
content_en: Ximen Garden Inn is a 100% non-smoking hotel. We provide hair dryers, bath towels, and small towels. However, we DO NOT provide disposable toiletries (e.g., toothbrush, toothpaste, razor) or bidet toilets. Please bring your own toiletries.
content_tw: 喜園旅館為全館禁菸。我們提供吹風機、浴巾、小毛巾。但我們「不提供」一次性備品（如牙刷、牙膏、刮鬍刀）及免治馬桶，請務必自備備品。

title: 寵物入住規定
content_en: Pets are welcome with a surcharge of NTD 500 per pet per night. Please keep pets on a leash in public areas. Pets must not be left alone in the room, and hotel towels are for human use only.
content_tw: 寵物入住每隻每晚加收 NTD 500。在公共區域請繫牽繩，不可將寵物單獨留在房內，且館內毛巾不可供寵物使用。

title: 一般接機服務
content_en: We offer airport pickup (TPE to Hotel): Small car (4 pax): NTD 1500 / Large van (8 pax): NTD 2000. Night surcharge (23:00-06:00): +NTD 200. Please provide: Date, Flight No., Arrival Time (AM/PM), Terminal, Number of Pax/Luggage.
content_tw: 我們提供桃園機場接機：小車 (4人) NTD 1500 / 大車 (8人) NTD 2000。夜間加成 (23:00-06:00) +NTD 200。預訂請提供：日期、航班編號、抵達時間 (AM/PM)、航廈、人數/行李數。

title: 2026過年接送機
content_en: CNY Special Rate (Feb 11 - Feb 22, 2026). Pickup: Small NTD 1800 / Large NTD 2300. Drop-off: Small NTD 1500 / Large NTD 2000. Night surcharge applies (+NTD 100-200). Please provide your flight details to book.
content_tw: 2026 過年期間 (2/11-2/22) 特殊費率。接機：小車 1800 / 大車 2300。送機：小車 1500 / 大車 2000。夜間加成另計。預訂請提供航班資訊。

title: 加人/加備品費用
content_en: We do not provide extra beds. Extra person fee: NTD 300 (includes towel/water) or NTD 500 (includes pillow/duvet/towel/water). Extra pillow: NTD 100 / Extra duvet: NTD 300.
content_tw: 全館無法加床。加人費用：NTD 300 (含毛巾/水) 或 NTD 500 (含枕頭/棉被/毛巾/水)。額外加枕頭 NTD 100，加棉被 NTD 300。
